action.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__knowledgebase_categories` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `slug` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `parent` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `ordering` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `access` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `publish_up` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `publish_down` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `enabled` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `hits` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `created_by` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `modified_by` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `checked_out` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `language` char(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '*', `icon` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'nopic.png', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `slug` (`slug`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__knowledgebase_items` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `slug` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `body` text NOT NULL, `featured` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `ordering` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `access` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `publish_up` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `publish_down` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `enabled` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `hits` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `created_by` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `modified_by` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `checked_out` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `language` char(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '*', `params` text NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `metadata` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__knowledgebase_itemcat` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `item_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `cat_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `item_cat` (`item_id`,`cat_id`), KEY `item_id` (`item_id`), KEY `cat_id` (`cat_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
